name: Revenge of the Sus
description:
What should have taken a few days ended up taking a few weeks, but it's finally here! REVENGE OF THE SUS is a simple survival game where you must kill as many sus crewmates as you can, and challenge your friends to beat your score. There isn't much to it, but I had a lot of fun making it!

NOTE: If you're trying to play the game on Google Chrome, you may need to visit "chrome://flags" and enable WebGL Draft Extensions after finding it in the list.
